summary: The 'Protecting and Enhancing Public Access to Codes Act' addresses public access to technical standards incorporated into law. It defines terms like 'incorporated by reference' and 'standards development organization.' The bill mandates that standards development organizations make incorporated standards publicly accessible online at no cost, with searchable content. It also tasks the Comptroller General with studying the financial impact on governments of accessing these standards and providing recommendations to mitigate any adverse impacts.
